name: tanner-s-collection-builder-test-site-data
title: Tanner's Collection Builder Test Site Data
description: Metadata and data derived from Tanner's Collection Builder Test Site. CollectionBuilder-CSV is a template for creating digital collection exhibits using static web technology.

contributors.title: Center for Digital Inquiry and Learning (CDIL)

resources.title: Tanner's Collection Builder Test Site Metadata Facets
